textTemplates.name: EmailMsgCancellationBody
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Application cancelled

Dear {!ApplicantFirstName}

Your application has been cancelled. Please find the application details below. 

Cancellation Reason: {!$Record.Cancellation_Reason_picklist__c} 
Details: {!$Record.Cancellation_Reason__c} 

Application Details
 
Case ID{!$Record.Application_Case_Autonumber__c}
Application ID{!$Record.Name}
Status{!$Record.Status}
Submitted on{!SubmissionDate}
Applicant(s){!$Record.ApplicantNames__c}
What's next?

If you have a question or need more information about the application, contact your bank.
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

© State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: EmailMsgExtension2Applicant
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Application extended

Dear Applicant

We previously confirmed you had been provisionally approved to participate in the Victorian Homebuyer
Fund in a letter dated {!$Record.Provisional_Approval_Date__c}.

Thank you for notifying us that you have not been able to enter into a contract of sale for an Eligible
Home.


After considering your request to extend your provisional approval, the State of Victoria through the
Department of Treasury and Finance (Program Provider) has decided to extend your
provisional approval to {!$Record.Expiry_Date1__c}.


Please note the Program Provider will not extend your provisional approval beyond {!$Record.Expiry_Date1__c}
Application Details
 
Case ID{!$Record.Application_Case_Autonumber__c}
Application ID{!$Record.Name}
Status{!$Record.Status}
Submitted on{!SubmissionDate}
Expiry date{!$Record.Expiry_Date1__c}
Applicant(s){!$Record.ApplicantNames__c}

What's next?

Please provide a signed contract of sale to your bank/lender after purchasing
a property.

Your provisional approval will expire unless you have entered into a contract
of sale to purchase an eligible home by {!$Record.Expiry_Date1__c}.
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

© State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: EmailMsgExtensionApplicant
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Application extended

Dear Applicant

We previously confirmed you had been provisionally approved to participate in the Victorian Homebuyer
Fund in a letter dated {!$Record.Provisional_Approval_Date__c}.
Thank you for notifying us that you have not been able to enter into a contract of sale for an Eligible
Home.
After considering your request to extend your provisional approval, the State of Victoria through the
Department of Treasury and Finance (Program Provider) has decided to extend your
provisional approval to {!$Record.Expiry_Date1__c}.

Application details
 
Case ID{!$Record.Application_Case_Autonumber__c}
Application ID{!$Record.Name}
Status{!$Record.Status}
Expiry date{!$Record.Expiry_Date1__c}
Applicant(s){!$Record.ApplicantNames__c}

What's next?

Please provide a signed contract of sale to your bank/lender after purchasing
a property.
Your provisional approval will expire unless you have entered into a contract
of sale to purchase an eligible home by {!$Record.Expiry_Date1__c}.
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

© State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: EmailMsgProvisionalApproval
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Application provisionally approved

Dear {!$Record.Panel_Finance_Officer__r.FirstName}

The application you submitted is provisionally approved.
Application Details
 
Case ID{!$Record.Application_Case_Autonumber__c}
Application ID{!$Record.Name}
Status{!$Record.Status}
Provisionally approved on{!$Record.Provisional_Approval_Date__c}
Expires on{!$Record.Expiry_Date1__c}
Applicant(s){!$Record.ApplicantNames__c}

What's next?

Please complete the buying guide checklist and submit it with a signed

contract of sale to your bank/lender after purchasing a property.
View Application
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

© State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: EmailMsgSubmission
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Application submitted

Dear {!$Record.Panel_Finance_Officer__r.FirstName}

We've received your application. Please find the application details below. 
 
Application Details
 
Case ID{!$Record.Application_Case_Autonumber__c}
Application ID{!$Record.Name}
Status{!$Record.Status}
Submitted on{!SubmissionDate}
Applicant(s){!$Record.ApplicantNames__c}
 
What's next?

You will be notified once the provisional approval decision has been made, within 5 working days.
   View Application   
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

© State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: EmailMsgUpdated
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Application updated

Dear {!$Record.Panel_Finance_Officer__r.FirstName}

Your application submitted through {!$Record.Lender_Account__r.Name} on {!SubmissionDate} to participate in the Victorian Homebuyer Fund has been updated. 

Application Details
 
Case ID{!$Record.Application_Case_Autonumber__c}
Application ID{!$Record.Name}
Status{!$Record.Status}
Submitted on{!SubmissionDate}
Applicant(s){!$Record.ApplicantNames__c}
 
What's next?
